Description:
After an epic battle, the mighty Kraken is finally defeated, but it refuses to let you enjoy your victory.

With its last ounce of will, the creature grabs you with its powerful tentacles, determined to drag you down to the ocean’s depths to share a cold tomb with it.

Though its tentacles were battered and weakened during the fight, they remain strong enough to hold you tight.
DescriptionAction: But your will is strong, and you haven’t said your last word. It’s time to resist!

    "SSCRewardText": "You resist with all your might, each of you struggling for what feels like an eternity.\r\n\nEverything turns black—not from losing consciousness, but from the lack of light.
